product_name: Columbia Just Right Straight Leg Pants - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: The Columbia Just Right Straight Leg Pants in Women's Plus Sizes stretch, block harmful UV rays and resist moisture so you can turn your summer hike into a comfortable ramble or-an epic journey. Quick-drying nylon/elastane fabric offers 2-way comfort stretch. Omni-Shade(TM) technology delivers outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection. Omni-Shield(TM) finish resists rain, stream splashings and stains, and dries quickly, so pants stay lighter in weight. Interior drawcord at waist fine-tunes the fit; drawcords at hems let you cinch out dust and wind. Columbia Just Right Straight Leg Pants in Women's Plus Sizes feature a zip-closed security pocket.
